issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
build fails with

[INFO]  Initializing the build directory
[DEBUG] Recreating /Users/tom/projects/x-app/build/iphone
[INFO]  Replacing the populateIosFiles() function in the iOS Build plugin
[ERROR] Can't inject hook into ios build
fields.summary: 5.2.0, xcode7: [ERROR] Can't inject hook into ios build

comments.body:
Hi,

Please include details environment information and steps to reproduce.

What does *appc ti info -t ios* find for Xcode?
Could we get a reproducible test case?

Additional information, screenshots would be helpful.

Thanks
